enhanced_by.reason: The 'basic' method relies on 'addTags' to define the allowed tags, ensuring the state is correctly set up.
The 'basic' method uses 'addAttributes' to define allowed attributes for specific tags, ensuring the state is correctly set up.
The 'basic' method uses 'addProtocols' to define allowed protocols for specific attributes, ensuring the state is correctly set up.

The 'isSafeAttribute' method can be used to validate if the attributes added by 'basic' are correctly allowed, providing assertions for the test cases.
